title: President offers Eid prayer, prays for prosperity of nation, Ummah
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 3(APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Tuesday offered Eid ul Fitr prayer here at Faisal mosque.
The president prayed for the progress and prosperity of the nation, the country and the Muslim Ummah.
Later, the president also exchanged Eid greetings with the people.
